title: Fat cursive font
content:
Need help with this font for a recreation. Is the "D" even part of the same font, or is it an altered version of the font. Please help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020223004im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dom_4288.jpg)
author: eroc816

comments.content: WOW! Thank you so much. I've never heard of this font.
